package.name: clamav
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` # export CC="distcc /usr/local/gcc54/bin/gcc54" # export CXX="distcc /usr/local/gcc54/bin/g++54" export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" ./configure --prefix=/opt --sysconfdir=/etc --disable-zlib-vcheck # CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" make -j $jobcount else # export CC="/usr/local/gcc54/bin/gcc54" # export CXX="/usr/local/gcc54/bin/g++54" ./configure --prefix=/opt --sysconfdir=/etc --disable-zlib-vcheck make fi
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} make install rm /opt/share/clamav/main.cvd rm /opt/share/clamav/daily.cvd mkdir -p /opt/share/clamav/ touch /opt/share/clamav/keep_this_directory
